participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Chloe is lively, social, and enjoys the finer things in life. She's a bit of a trendsetter and loves to be in the spotlight.
participant_1.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i'm high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love spending money. i love listening to britney spears.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is thoughtful and nurturing, balancing her career and personal life while preparing for motherhood.
participant_2.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

content.text: Hey! Do you love spending money?
